main.name: Rebekah Saugen
main.description: I enjoy learning, collaborating, and getting things done
main.bio: I am most interested in building fault tolerant, extendable, scalable systems. I have experience developing Android applications, and backend microservice systems. Yes, I can go fullstack. My most current mission is to become proficient in machine learning and AI. I am a past student-athlete and naturally gravitate towards leading and working in team-based settings. I enjoy good coffee, family time, and the Northern Shore of Minnesota.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
